title: Rules
context: §291-56 Rules. The disability and communication access board shall adopt rules under chapter 91 to carry out the purposes of this part, including rules for: (1) The issuance, renewal, confiscation, revocation, and suspension of removable windshield placards, temporary removable windshield placards, and special license plates; (2) Decertification, reciprocity, and the replacement of placards and identification cards; (3) The design of the placard, identification card, and special license plates; (4) The establishment of transaction fees for placards; (5) Signage and marking of parking spaces; (6) Reimbursement rates to the counties; and (7) Penalties. [L 1984, c 46, pt of §2; am L 1992, c 46, §8; am L 1997, c 308, §12; am L 1999, c 282, §7; am L 2001, c 297, §10; am L 2003, c 30, §9; am L 2006, c 269, §5; am L 2010, c 141, §8]
